resources.string: Enter Count Of Segment in mm
D - The outer finish diameter of the ring to be make. The maximum diameter of the ring in your product. Measured in millimeters.
B - The width of the ring, excluding machining allowances. Measured in millimeters.
S - Side allowance, inside and outside. It is used to compensate for displacement during gluing, as well as a safety spase in turning. Measured in millimeters. Usually 1mm to 3mm is enough
N - The number of segments into which the ring is divided. Usually from 4 to 96 pices.
